title: Taiwan feared Biden would be softer than Trump on China. So far, it has been pleasantly surprised.
content:
1. Taiwan feared Biden would be softer than Trump on China. So far, it has been pleasantly surprised.  NBC News
  2. As Biden and Xi Begin a Careful Dance, a New American Policy Takes Shape  The New York Times
  3. China's ambassador to US says he doesn't have 'high expectations' for Alaska summit with Biden officials  CNN
  4. US-China Meeting in Alaska: Biden Team Is Already Talking Tough  Bloomberg
  5. Opinion | Rising to the Challenge of China  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Taiwan feared Biden would be softer than Trump on China. So far, it has been pleasantly surprised.  NBC News
As Biden and Xi Begin a Careful Dance, a New American Policy Takes Shape  The New York Times

localize.title: 台湾担心拜登在中国问题上会比特朗普软弱。到目前为止，它已经感到很惊喜。
臺灣擔心拜登在中國問題上會比特朗普軟弱。到目前爲止，它已經感到很驚喜。
